column4: can someone help me with a " Unable to build the vmmon module. " Error I keep getting ? I think there is a problem with the compiler ???
myrtti says " E: Could not get lock /var/lib/dpkg/lock - open (11 Resource temporarily unavailable)
E: Unable to lock the administration directory (/var/lib/dpkg/), is another process using it?
IS another process using it? ps -e
